It works!
Load windows like normal, and it's probably best to turn off your anti-virus. 
Then run the exe and wait a little bit for it to load.
Then click on "Activate"
Wait for the program to finish installing the files and everything, and it will come to a point where it says "Please wait"
This is where you need to restart your computer.
When you are booted up again, relaunch the exe and this time when it finishes, the program will get past the "Please wait" and will ask you to restart (I again turned off my antivirus before I launched the exe, just to make sure).
Once you restart, your copy of Windows will be activated :)
This worked on Windows 7 Professional, retail. 
Thanks No_Religion! ^_^
